Package ohos.agp.components

Interface Attr


  • public interface Attr
    Obtains attribute values.

    Attr interface contains the set of methods that need to be implemented to support attribute value design. Attr objects are used in AttrSet to apply Component properties in constructor.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean getBoolValue​()
      Obtains the Boolean value of an attribute.
      Color getColorValue​()
      Obtains the Color value of an attribute.
      Context getContext​()
      Obtains the context associated with an attribute.
      int getDimensionValue​()
      Obtains the dimension value of an attribute.
      Element getElement​()
      Obtains the Element value of an attribute.
      float getFloatValue​()
      Obtains the floating point value of an attribute.
      int getIntegerValue​()
      Obtains the integer value of an attribute.
      long getLongValue​()
      Obtains the long value of an attribute.
      String getName​()
      Obtains the name of an attribute, for example, width.
      String getStringValue​()
      Obtains the character string value of an attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName​()
        Obtains the name of an attribute, for example, width.
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the attribute.

      • getStringValue

        String getStringValue​()
        Obtains the character string value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the character string value of the attribute.

      • getIntegerValue

        int getIntegerValue​()
        Obtains the integer value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the integer value of the attribute; returns the default value 0 if the attribute does not have an integer value.

      • getBoolValue

        boolean getBoolValue​()
        Obtains the Boolean value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the Boolean value (true or false) of the attribute; returns the default value false if the attribute does not have a Boolean value.

      • getFloatValue

        float getFloatValue​()
        Obtains the floating point value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the floating point value of the attribute; returns the default value 0 if the attribute does not have a floating point value.

      • getLongValue

        long getLongValue​()
        Obtains the long value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the long value of the attribute; returns the default value 0 if the attribute does not have a long value.

      • getElement

        Element getElement​()
        Obtains the Element value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element value of the attribute; returns the default value null if the attribute does not have a Element value.
        Since:
        3

      • getDimensionValue

        int getDimensionValue​()
        Obtains the dimension value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer representing the dimension value of the attribute; returns the default value 0 if the attribute does not have a dimension value.
        Since:
        3

      • getColorValue

        Color getColorValue​()
        Obtains the Color value of an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the Color value of the attribute; returns the default value null if the attribute does not have a Color value.
        Since:
        3

      • getContext

        Context getContext​()
        Obtains the context associated with an attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the attribute context.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        #setContext(Context)
